Class ConverterHub

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.primaresearch.dla.page.layout.converter.ConverterHub

  • public class ConverterHub
extends java.lang.Object
    Central access point for converting page objects to specific format versions.
    Author:
    clc

      • convert

        public static java.util.List<ConversionMessage> convert(Page page,
                                        org.primaresearch.io.FormatModel targetModel)
        Converts the given page (layout) to the specified target format (might change attributes, attribute values and attribute constraints).
        Parameters:
        page - Page object containing the layout
        targetModel - Target model for a specific format version
